content: आत्मनीन {%<ab>a.</ab>%} [आत्मने हितः ख] {@--1@} Belonging to oneself, one's own कस्यैष आत्मनीनः <ls>M. 4</ls> on whose side is he? {@--2@} Beneficial to oneself; आत्मनीनमुपतिष्ठते <ls>Ki. 13. 69</ls>, <ls n="Ki.">3. 16</ls>; <ls>Bh. 3. 77</ls>; good, fit, suitable, appropriate (as diet &c.). {@--3@} Existent. sentient. --नः {@--1@} A son. {@--2@} A wife's brother. {@--3@} A jester (in dramas).
